title: Builder warranties (new construction)
dataVerified: Builder name, homeowner, property address, warranty terms, coverage
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Warranty status (active/expired/claimed). Link to builder/warranty company system (homeowner and subsequent owners, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged builder warranties. Domain binding verifies builder/warranty company. Long warranty periods (10-year structural). Defect claim verification. Transferable to subsequent owners.
